name: Counter Fire 4 GO Team Strike 3D VR
name_original: Counter Fire 4 GO Team Strike 3D VR
description:
Based on the classic Counter Strike game.
VR support changed to Cardboard technology.
Counter Fire 4GO is a shooter designed for the Cardboard and other Augmented Virtual Reality viewers for iOS devices.

Enjoy 3D shooting Game on your iPhone~!!
WARNING! New screen controls game, that are very similar to games like GTA. New added two types of video soldier!
NEW Game Counter Fire 4 GO+ !!!
New Vision and video control!
Added new maps!
WARNING! New video controls game!
WARNING. New version game Counter Fire v4 GO !!!
added 2 types of game controls
NEW added map mansion aztec dust dust2 and more de_nuke!!!
NEW added a new weapon grenade, rpg, m3super90, m16, ak47,knife!!!
added new soldiers!!!
Command Network multiplayer games.
Set of levels as for single mission so for network game.
Huge choice of the weapon for task performance.
Cool and great 3D graphics.
Attention! action price drop! hurry to buy the game! action is limited!
Thanks.
